name: Pandamned - or The Apocalypse Doesnt Wait for you
name_original: Pandamned - or The Apocalypse Doesnt Wait for you
description:
A story based scavenge RPG set in Earth's near future where a strange new pandemic has changed the majority of the population into zom... Pandas that obsess about something in their past life. (Check the intro panels for the story in the game)

This project started out as a 4 month game where I coded everything from the ground up in Unity and developed all the assets myself. As of creating this game page (30 November) the game has been 3 months in development and I have created a demo version for you to have a look at and provide feedback if you wish. 

The demo will have 10 of the 100 days of the story as well as a few other limitations that you can read about on the tutorial panels. 

Thank you for giving it a go. All donations are very much appreciated and will help me continue working on this (and other games) full time. 

Controls:

- Mainly left button interaction with the mouse

- Right click on inventory items will enlarge them

- Right click and drag will move the skill tree as well as when starting the explore area so you can have a look at the blueprint of the building a bit better

- Scroll wheel to zoom in and out of the skill tree and explore area

All systems apart from the "Town Explore" and "Home interior" are complete. It is now just about creating more content and better menu transitions and UI work. 

All feedback appreciated!
